HealthTip.Title: Headaches 101: Know your type
HealthTip.Body: Your head hurts. Again. To better understand your headaches, take a close look at your symptoms. Do your headaches feel like a tight band around your head? These are probably tension headaches, easily treated with over-the-counter pain relievers. Are your headaches often accompanied by nausea, vomiting, or sensitivity to light or sound? These may be migraines, which often require prescription medication. Do you have headaches nearly every day? These could be chronic daily headaches, which may require preventive treatment. If your headaches are disrupting your daily activities, talk with your doctor.
